title: Continuous Predictive Modeling of Clinical Notes and ICD Codes in Patient Health Records
details: MH Caralt, CBL Ng, M Rei - arXiv preprint arXiv:2405.11622, 2024
abstract: Electronic Health Records (EHR) serve as a valuable source of patient information, offering insights into medical histories, treatments, and outcomes. Previous research has developed systems for detecting applicable ICD codes that should be assigned …
